titles: Good nevves from Plymouth being a true relation of the death of Sir Ralph Hopton, and many of his commanders, vvho by treachery fought to surprise the good towne of Plymouth.
notes: An imaginary account of an event which had not taken place.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
